Articles.Content:
Dead Propeller Research

This is basicly my collection of random trys at creating new wings or wing/body configurations. I only currently have two majorly sucessful designs, both of them based on different wings.

DP-1 Destroyer

Powered by eather 2 or 4 engines, this testbed was designed to test the hell out of the forward swept wing made from stock parts (not the moded large forward swept wing by JellyCubes or the canard). If you are seing this right, the hell was tested out of it.

Compared to other wings of comparable lift, this wing is completly unbraced, which is saying something since the engines are mounted to it, as is the main wheels. It dampens the pitch and roll though, so is better on a bomber than a fighter.

DP-2 Lifter

This aircraft is a basic flying wing. As with the Destroyer, the wing has a pitch and roll damping effect, so a better bomber than fighter. This wing though is the most efficiant I have found, having been able to fly from Kerbal Space Center to the other easter egg space center, and land.

Really good wing design, but very hard to impement compared to the Forward swept wing of the destroyer.

very nice

Any chance at the .craft files :
